nodes.bodyText:
I'm not sure. I'm guessing the critical thing is whether an epoch has been set or not in the RPM spec?  One could theoretically set epoch 0, in case it might work and could serve to document it?
In any case I would like to avoid touching https://git.ouroath.com/vespa/vespa-yahoo/blob/master/hosted/host-admin/src/main/java/com/yahoo/vespa/hosted/hostadmin/task/network/FirewallTask.java#L71
